Description:
IN/1/OIG2/LD/160921/01 - 311883502 - You have failed to make and give effect to appropriate arrangements to control, monitor and review the quality of your metalworking fluids, exposing your employees to risk of respiratory and skin problems such as occupational lung disease and dermatitis. You should ensure that concentration, pH, bacterial growth and tramp oil are monitored at appropriate intervals and take action as indicated by the results to maintain the fluid quality.

IN/1/OIG2/LD/160921/02 - 311883533 - You have failed to make and give effect to appropriate arrangements to control, monitor and review the maintenance of work equipment safety devices including interlocks, fixed guards and telescopic trip devices throughout your workplace in that safety devices were observed to be damaged or missing from several items of work equipment and no system was in place in for pre-use checks, supervisor checks or defect reporting and preventing the use of machinery in need of repair.
